Title: Again, FG rejects CPC tag as Falana dismisses Trump’s genocide claim
Summary: The Federal Government has again dismissed Nigeria’s designation by the United States as a Country of Particular Concern (CPC) over alleged religious persecution .

Title: How to make strained Israel-Hamas ceasefire work
Summary: World leaders have a responsibility to fashion out strategies to tackle some envisaged post-war challenges with a view to making the peace deal work .

Title: Ghana lifts ban on pro boxing to open door for Joshua’s fight
Summary: Ghana’s National Sports Authority will lift the suspension on professional boxing today . Matchroom will stage their first-ever event in the West African nation five days before Christmas .

Title: Police dismantle major arms, kidnapping syndicate in Delta, Anambra
Summary: Police dismantled major arms and kidnapping network operating between Delta and Anambra States, leading to multiple arrests and the recovery of firearms . The operation was part of a renewed offensive against organised crime .

Title: What Languages Do Nigerians Speak?
Summary: What Languages Do Nigerians Speak? With over 20 languages, you’re about to discover the extraordinary linguistic heritage that makes Nigeria truly unique . With over over 20,000 languages, Nigerians speak different dialects .

Title: Lagos trains 10,000 safeguarding officers to protect children
Summary: Lagos State Government has trained over 10,000 safeguarding officers across schools and institutions . The Domestic and Sexual Violence Agency (DSVA) said this at the One-Day Policy Review . The Executive Secretary, Mrs Titilola Vivour-Adeniyi, said this .

Title: US military design plan for intervention in Nigeria – light, medium or heavy
Summary: '... move an aircraft carrier group into the Gulf of Guinea and ... deploy fighters and perhaps long-range bombers to conduct strikes' '... deploy fighters, perhaps long range bombers to carry out strikes'

Title: CSOs raise red flag over FIRS officials as new tax regime looms
Summary: Civil society organisations raised concerns over possible conflict-of-interest issues involving some officials of the Federal Inland Revenue Service . They called on the National Assembly and anti-corruption agencies to urgently look into the matter .

Title: Nigeria’s MSMEs need inclusive financing, stronger partnerships to thrive — experts
Summary: Financial experts have called for inclusive financing and stronger collaboration among government, banks, and private sector players . They made the call at the Manufacturing Business Accelerator (MBA) Cohort 2 Graduation and Business Showers held in Lagos .

Title: Dollar to Naira exchange rate today, November 6, 2025
Summary: The naira traded around ₦1,440 to the US dollar on Nigeria’s official Daily Nigerian Foreign Exchange Market (NFEM) on Thursday .
